children.text: This plays different music, changes the background, and changes the HUD based on which game mode was selected.
Call game over when blocks reach the top...
...Or when the timer runs out (Timed mode only)
Set game over menu header text (changes based on game mode)
On the Construct Arcade, submit scores when playing in Arcade mode.
Fade blocks to black, then open game over menu
Save new data. Called upon game over or quitting a game IF your hi score exceeds the old one.
Add to timer if in arcade mode
Subtract from timer if in timed mode
Every 500 points, increase speed and score multiplier by 1 and increase the block speed
Play sound function. Tag prevents sounds from stacking.
Run a nested loop to create the initial 6x4 grid of blocks
Create a new row of blocks at the bottom
Create a new row of blocks when all have entered the playfield
Stop blocks from scrolling upwards under certain conditions
Activate blocks when they are into the play field
Prevent block swapping under some circumstances
This gives blocks the potential to create a skill chain
Check if any blocks are dropping or not
Reset the chain if no blocks are dropping
When all blocks have landed, find matches to check for skill chains
If a block has nothing underneath it, prep it for falling
SwapBlocker prevents blocks from being shifted 1 space underneath a falling block and is destroyed when the block lands.
Combo (More than 3 blocks in a match)
Chain (blocks created a match upon landing)
Create chain enabler to give blocks potential for skill chains
When matched, make blocks glow and then POP!
